Class AbstractChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractChessPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChessPiece
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, Knight, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class AbstractChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChessPiece
    This class represents an abstract chess piece. It implements the ChessPiece interface and provides the basic functionality of a chess piece. It has a row, a column, and a color. It provides the basic functionality of a chess piece, such as getting the row, column, and color of the piece, and checking if the piece can kill another piece.
